rawMetadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.30+commit.73712a01"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[],"devdoc":{"details":"Structure concatenating an arbitrary number of bytes buffers with limited memory allocation. The Accumulators library provides a memory-efficient alternative to repeated concatenation of bytes. Instead of copying data on each concatenation (O(n**2) complexity), it builds a linked list of references to existing data and performs a single memory allocation during flattening (O(n) complexity). Uses 0x00 as sentinel value for empty state (i.e. null pointers) ==== How it works 1. Create an empty accumulator with null head/tail pointers 2. Add data using {push} (append) or {shift} (prepend). It creates linked list nodes 3. Each node stores a reference to existing data (no copying) 4. Call {flatten} to materialize the final concatenated result in a single operation ==== Performance * Addition: O(1) per operation (just pointer manipulation) * Flattening: O(n) single pass with one memory allocation * Memory: Minimal overhead until flattening (only stores references)","kind":"dev","methods":{},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/structs/Accumulators.sol":"Accumulators"},"evmVersion":"prague","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[":@openzeppelin/contracts/=contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/",":account-abstraction/=lib/account-abstraction/contracts/",":erc4626-tests/=lib/erc4626-tests/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":halmos-cheatcodes/=lib/halmos-cheatcodes/",":openzeppelin-contracts/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/"]},"sources":{"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Memory.sol":{"keccak256":"0x1f08e61bc092989077108bc3fed13d0e2427c13ec61b9da285a797fc44bba4fe","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9d2c2b74305fe321a0ca02c2c5895da1e8e52bb2958b7d6d15c1d2ddfcc97626","dweb:/ipfs/QmbvwxompsryrjSDn3yz2wVWKaB3JHB1wjkexvERfnykGF"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Panic.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf7fe324703a64fc51702311dc51562d5cb1497734f074e4f483bfb6717572d7a","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c6a5ff4f9fd8649b7ee20800b7fa387d3465bd77cf20c2d1068cd5c98e1ed57a","dweb:/ipfs/QmVSaVJf9FXFhdYEYeCEfjMVHrxDh5qL4CGkxdMWpQCrqG"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/Math.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe7b82bf9ab6d5016033e5cd2b1d4320a9c12551551d4c57650b5ddebfa47ff07","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://57dd5fbf78e3866b8988cfada7592de8a285cd14e6b42c694526971481bf23d2","dweb:/ipfs/Qmf6Lu6k74k6vgj5kTNYqh2eSHx72urgiD5yYrw7MTY7JT"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/math/SafeCast.sol":{"keccak256":"0x340b2f51e4c8aa4e3b2c4e3e12a34ac86f4383ecda2bdbad2e263b5a2d3444a3","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f7ce09e887e3407bcfc09de5e263143cc44c8bcc4162a32acdb3144eafd89ce2","dweb:/ipfs/QmXda4wEQSWT5xQrETZdBXP2M67LH4F49QxQ16rTj6zZ99"]},"contracts/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/structs/Accumul
